entry.title: error: no instance of overloaded function "tex1Dfetch" matches the argument list argument types are: (texture<double, 1, cudaReadModeElementType>, int)
entry.content:
问题

bash stencilexample.cu(147): error: no instance of overloaded function "tex1Dfetch" matches the argument list argument types are: (texture<double, 1, cudaReadModeElementType>, int)

解决方法

cuda的纹理存储器不支持 double
